lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because:
As someone who grew my business via boot strap funding it myself, I know how hard it is to grow a business.
I want to help people who have a DREAM and are willing to put in the hard work to make it happen.
lender.occupational_info: I sell advertising in parking garages all over the USA, as well as giant double decker buses and trolleys here in Chicago via The Chicago Trolley & Double Decker Bus Company. I am looking for ways to get involved with other people who are involved in advertising in other countrys all over the world.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I write a website about music and musicians from around the world, in an attempt to promote cross-cultural awareness through music. I also help to run music festivals which present multicultural lineups of different musical groups.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I want to show the love of Jesus Christ.
lender.occupational_info: I am an academic counselor who advises students on what classes to take to get their diploma or college degree.

lender.name: Travis
lender.loan_because:
I love the spirit of the entrepreneur and believe that people can accomplish great things if given the opportunity.
I read Banker to the Poor by Muhammed Yunus and got very excited about how Microcredit could help people improve their lives.
When I found out about Kiva and how it creates an opportunity to allow individuals to have a direct impact on the lives of others around the world I knew that I had to get involved.

lender.name: Donny
lender.loan_because: not really sure...maybe someone is able to do more with my money than myself
lender.occupational_info: i am in the control of 2 companies each having around 15 jobs going all the time. i make sure they are running smooth to ensure we get the jobs done properly

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I would like to see these people succeed in their businesses and make their lives richer for them and their families.

lender.name: tommy
lender.loan_because: I want to help my parents with selling furnitures and help them by paying my brother's school
lender.occupational_info: someone trust me to sell their product, and I can get money 1 $ a day. Now I want to buy their products and then I sell it all by my self

lender.name: Samantha
lender.loan_because: I've seen Karma at work. Help others, help yourself.
lender.occupational_info: I would like to create a movement, through the power of film, towards creating a better tomorrow and educating others on the importance helping your fellow (wo)man around the world.

lender.name: carol
lender.loan_because: because i can , because i think i should and because i love to.,,micro financing makes good sense .Everyone should have a chance.
lender.occupational_info: single mum of 4 with 2 still at home.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: Small contributions go a long way!

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by others' efforts to make their own way way in the world, inspired by their initiative and strength in the face of adversity, and their efforts to lend a hand to each other. Their spirit, perseverance, and drive connects them to me-- and ignites my wish to offer support when I can -- in order to pass forward help and encouragement that I myself have received along my own path.
lender.occupational_info: My work is focused on improving safety for people in transportation systems.

lender.name: Louis
lender.loan_because: My parents came from poor beginnings, both from semi-farming/agriculture backgrounds in Puerto Rico. My father cut sugar cane and my mother worked as a house servant, harvested mangos and did many farm chores. I think of them - loving them - when I invest in Kiva. I do this because I care, because I believe and because I respect.... you can to.
lender.occupational_info: Access to Justice!

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: I want to be a part of something good.
lender.occupational_info:
Environmentalist
I am a friend of Bill Wilson.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: We plan menus for beach weddings, family reunions, parties, corporate and military events.

lender.name: Paul & Daisy
lender.loan_because: It 's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Helping kids communicate in English

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I believe everybody should try to make the world a fairer place.

lender.name: Jacob
lender.loan_because: People deserve help.
lender.occupational_info: Right now I am a college student studying Industrial and Systems Engineering. I have 8 brothers and sisters, 3 dogs, and an assortment of plants.

lender.name: Jeanette
lender.loan_because: I like to help people earn a better life.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I want to motivate others!

lender.name: Brooke
lender.loan_because: even though I have little money, I have more than some and can make small sacrifices that equal big changes in peoples lives.
lender.occupational_info: full time university student and mother to 2 year old daughter

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: Every man and woman deserves an opportunity to work and succeed in a business venture. It is an honor to be a partner in the efforts of my loan recipients.
lender.occupational_info: Computer software development and integration. Large-scale project organization.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: "it's better to light a single candle than to curse the darkness."

lender.name: Lia & Marcelo
lender.loan_because: it's important to give people the opportunity to improve their quality of life... sometimes we just need that one little thing.... to take the next step...

lender.name: John J.
lender.loan_because: I don't want anyone to be poor.
lender.occupational_info: I study and teach Buddhism and try to help people be happier.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: The people at Kiva take the little bit of money I give and change the lives of other people. I cant do much but I know together we can help one person at a time. God Bless
lender.occupational_info: I take care of other familys children.

lender.name: Raymond
lender.loan_because: I can.And I want to help other people.
lender.occupational_info: I turn dirty water into safe water for the public to use and drink.

lender.name: Mackenzie
lender.loan_because: i care

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: I should. And you should too!!!! And I like the idea of the flow of money. How my initial loan does not stop after one person because once I get it back, I can give it to another person. It truly is a gift that keeps giving!!!

lender.name: KANDI
lender.occupation: Stay at home Mum of 4 children
lender.loan_because: I want to help but, but cant give hundreds or thoudands of dollars so when I found Kiva it gave me a way to make a difference in someones life....
lender.occupational_info: I have 4 children aged 10, 7, 5 and 3 and I am so blessed to be able to stay home and take care of them and my husband.

lender.name: Carianne
lender.loan_because: I got a gift certificate from Kiva for Christmas.

lender.name: Isaac & Kelly
lender.loan_because: We want to do our part to help change the world -- one life at a time.

lender.name: Clarissa
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I want to support entrepreneurs who want to better their lives and contribute to their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I own my own staffing/recruiting company.

lender.name: Brian and Carol
lender.loan_because: it is a great way to help the world economy and allow people to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Brian manages international TV channels. Carol appraises homes.

lender.name: Kent & Rose & Danielle
lender.loan_because: We loan because it just makes sense. We earn more than we need. We also like the idea that 0 of the money loaned goes direct to where it is needed. We also like the idea that the money is used to help build self respect not just charity
lender.occupational_info: Kent is a Manager of a successful Solar retail shop. Rose is a purchasing officer in a large private hospital and Danielle is a year 11student

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I just want to do what I can to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a chemistry professor at a state university in California

lender.name: Jahangiri Family
lender.loan_because: We are a family that would like to help people in need. This loan to people is sort of a "family project." The families include: Shabaz, Ahmadi, Damirchi, Abdossamadi, and Jahangiri.
lender.occupational_info: The whole family has professional and different jobs.

lender.name: The Westman
lender.loan_because: it's the best way to help people from around the world feel the joys of being an entrepreneur

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: Hope is the dream of a waking man. Aristotle
lender.occupational_info: I help companies source with integrity and transparency for optimal benefit to all parties.

lender.name: deanna
lender.loan_because: I loan to help ohers so they can move foward and then they may be in a position to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I look after my husband and foster daughter. My life is not hard and so I am knitting for charities so I can give something back.

lender.name: Prasheel
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I read Creating A World Without Poverty. In mentioning the book to a client they in turn told me of KIVA. I was inspired by the book and then shown where I could help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a hairdresser. Mainly coloring, straightening and cutting hair. I also have a homebased business selling Healthy Dark Chocolate.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: It is fullfilling to know that you have helped people who truly are in need and willing to make a change in their lives.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: Simply stated: It just feels good, this organization gives me an opportunity to help those who want to make a difference in their lives and the lives of their families.
lender.occupational_info: As an independent financial advisor I help middle income families in America become debt free and financially independent

lender.name: Havana
lender.loan_because: I feel that people should have the chance to pursue their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: I believe in baby steps
lender.occupational_info: I am studying Political Science at UC Santa Barbara and I am deeply interested in the international behavior of politics and how international policies are made to help those in need.

lender.name: Three Brothers
lender.loan_because: We're looking ahead.
lender.occupational_info: Student/DJ, Student/World Traveler, Student/Musician

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: It takes such a small amount to be able to give so much help to people to both get ahead in life and allow them to gain more independence and self respect

lender.name: Megan & Chris
lender.loan_because: We'd like people in poverty to have the ability to provide for themselves and their families. We are blessed to live in a country where we have amazing opportunity and we would like to help others have the opportunity to thrive.
lender.occupational_info: We are both managers at a mortgage sales company. We lend money to people to purchase homes and to people who want to take cash from their homes to purchase other items.

lender.name: Miller Family
lender.loan_because: kiva provides the opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: A retired engineer and housewife with children who include a registered nurse and X-ray guy, a loan officer and dental manpower entrepreneur, an athletic trainer and cable guy, a teacher and IT entrepreneur. They are raising our 9 grandchildren.

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: Having spent years as a single parent, with hardly two ha'pennies to rub together, I know how hard and self defeating living on the breadline can be. There were times when people helped me in little ways and I was very grateful for their support.
lender.occupational_info: I work in schools working with children and their families who require support.

lender.name: Miguel Angel
lender.loan_because: I believe that we can make a difference even if it's just with $25.00 dollars at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I am the Director of Operations of a Staffing Firm. Basically I help companies find the right people for the job.

lender.name: Alayna
lender.loan_because: some of us just need a little help sometimes.

lender.name: Renie
lender.loan_because: I think it's wonderful when people help one another.
lender.occupational_info: I do Accounts Receivable for a Manufacturing Company

lender.name: Madison & Emily
lender.loan_because: I am happiest when I can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I support global text messaging

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of lending a hand to help people achieve their dreams.

lender.name: Lynley
lender.occupational_info: I work for a Not for Profit Incorporated Society. I advise people who are having problems with their personal finances - help them see how they can get out of unaffordable debt, teach them to live within their means, negotiate with creditors, etc

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Empowering people with money

lender.name: Chetan Singh
lender.loan_because: some one helped me when I needed money and now I have some to Lend.
lender.occupational_info: Over 31 years in my business. For details visit www.WhyAudit.com

lender.name: Shari
lender.loan_because: I would like to make small difference in the world and it feels wonderful to give to those less fortunate than myself.
lender.occupational_info: I have for many years run a business that teaches young people to dance. I watch the childrens development sometimes over many years and it gives me much pleasure seeing their achievements.

lender.name: arly
lender.loan_because: i need to develop my business, because i want to help more people to get job.
lender.occupational_info: i design some clothes and i have home industri to produce clothes and apparel.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: There is no excuse not to!

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because:
Financial prosperity, and success in business or personal life is external evidence of God's favor.
"But you shall remember the LORD your God, for it is He who is giving you power to make wealth, that He may confirm His covenant which He swore to your fathers, as it is this day" (Deuteronomy 8:18)
lender.occupational_info: I handle the sales and service of surgical instruments used in the hospital operating room.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: It bridges the gap. It is what I can offer and a way to bring about change (and joy).
lender.occupational_info: Social entrepreneurship in the making.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I can. I feel grateful that many people have invested in me; now it's nice to invest in others.
lender.occupational_info: I work to bring the services of a large US bank to more countries around the world.

lender.name: Rajesh
lender.loan_because: I need a HD Professional camera for shooting my own films and rent somebody looking for make films.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently working as web designer in an Indian company based in Dubai. My ambition is making film. I have 8 years experience in film industry.

lender.name: Samuel
lender.loan_because: 1.) We Are All One 2.) There is Enough (money, love, compassion, abundance, life, you name it). 3.) I define "wealth" as access and happiness. By this I mean that most of the money in the world just sits in a bank account or a vault somewhere going unused and unaccessible to most people and I see Kiva as a great tool that gives more people "access" to this medium which allows them to become self-reliant. This is all done in the spirit of "cooperation," "use," and "oneness of all life." Cheers to Kiva and organizations like it. Namasté
lender.occupational_info: I currently work as a radiographer, which basically means I am a health-care worker who takes x-rays and cat-scans of people in a clinical setting.

lender.name: GarryWW
lender.loan_because: The world is so interconnected that when I loan to others, in reality, I loan to myself ! And 'myself' wants to live in a more ballanced world!
lender.occupational_info: I work with people that have an intellectual disability and require 24hr support in their everyday life. Creating a more fulfilling lifestyle and social structure on their behalf.

lender.name: Otto/Lill-Ann
lender.loan_because: It allows us to connect with other people all around the world, in a way that's based on mutual dignity.

lender.name: Tobias
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who need it.

lender.name: Christine & Lukas
lender.loan_because: it is one way to show our respect & support for others

lender.name: jessica
lender.loan_because: I want people to have a real chance.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently going to school to become a theatre teacher.

lender.name: Marisol and Maneesh
lender.loan_because: I am happy to have the opportunity to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I design clothes by researching what people are wearing, choosing fabric, and designing what the actual garment looks like. I work with pattern makers, sewers, and buyers to make sure they look right! I work with people locally and internationally.

lender.name: Kristine
lender.loan_because: I can share.
lender.occupational_info: Besides studying to be a medical research analist, I work in a laboratory testing food-products for micro-organisms. My task is to count the bacteria, yeasts and molds in food products, but also determine if there is legionella present in water samples.

lender.name: mary
lender.loan_because: My bussiness shows signs of improvement but i have no capital..I have many customers but always have shortage.I am an orphan and i am really in need of help so that i can continue with the bussiness
lender.occupational_info: I buy foodstuff and supply to the urban markets.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I love feeling the connection of helping others around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a social worker and chemical dependency counselor. I have strong interests in Motivational Interviewing and cognitive therapy. I love working with persons with severe mental illness and substance abuse problems.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: I believe that their is nothing more powerful than enabling people to learn and work. For those less fortunate, who cannot obtain loans through conventional ways because they do not have a steady job or property to their name, being able to start their own business and potentially be able to sustain their families thanks to loans from entities like Kiva, is an amazing opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: Perrywinkles Kids designs girls' dresses, specializing in the lost art of hand-smocking. We are based in Toronto, Canada and our dresses are manufactured in Lima, Peru. We visit our manufacturers on a regular basis and we are committed to providing a socially-conscious product.

lender.name: J Nguyen
lender.loan_because: What's $50 gonna buy me these days? I can't even fill my gas tank.

lender.name: Jim
lender.occupational_info: I inspect restaurants and hotels to ensure that they are following good health practices.

lender.name: Tyrone
lender.loan_because: opportunities like this -to help a complete stranger- that will enhance an individual's life, family well-being and potentially an entire community should be embraced.
lender.occupational_info: I serve people on a daily basis in the food service industry. I make people's stomaches (and sometimes their day) very happy. I love my line of work.

lender.name: Tina
lender.occupation: Sr. Financial Analyst and Seminary Student

lender.name: david
lender.loan_because: I have experienced poverty and received loans myself.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: My wonderful cousin Tom gifted me the account.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Spanish to 7th graders at a nice suburban Chicago school. They liked the idea of the loan and helped me pick who to lend to.

lender.name: Geert Jan
lender.loan_because: I think KIVA sets a great example of how all banks should have worked in the first place...
lender.occupational_info: I work in advertising, where my job is to make things look beautiful.

lender.name: Sam Michelson
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to start a business. I started YouNeverCall on my own. I want others to be as fortunate as I have been, to be able to start a business. I admire these people who are far less fortunate than many of us.
lender.occupational_info: YouNeverCall - We sell cell phones to people in the US via the internet. People buy from us because our prices are low and our customer service is great!

lender.name: Savoie Family
lender.loan_because: We are a blessed family and wish to share our blessing with others. Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.

lender.name: Gunnel
lender.loan_because: I want to support women and I can!

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I feel very blessed to live in a country as beautiful as Canada. I have traveled to a lot of different places and would like to give back to some of those places to help others be able to sustain a rewarding life.

lender.name: Paige Stodtmeister
lender.loan_because: I created a club in our high school called S.T.E.P (Students Trying to End Poverty) and are focusing on microfinancing as a way to help people out of poverty.

lender.name: Sunil
lender.loan_because: I wanted to see a better world with more human efforts and by helping each other.

lender.name: Jeff, Karen & Ethan
lender.loan_because: Nearly a thousand years ago, the sage Maimonides wrote: "A loan is better than charity, for it enables one to help himself."
lender.occupational_info: I organize a group of engineers who design and build rockets to carry things into space.

lender.name: John
lender.occupational_info: I live in New York City and work for the New York Mets.

lender.name: Rhiannon Skye
lender.loan_because: I live in the best developed country and have been disabled since 1980. Our government has provided me with food, shelter ,healthcare and clean water. I feel blessed to live in a country that takes care and feel it is good karma to help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: Do not work.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: Everyone has the right to credit.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I want others to have the opportunity i have been blessed with!
lender.occupational_info: I am a chandler and owner of Candles made from Soy

lender.name: Mark & Martha
lender.loan_because: Kiva is an awesome concept. We love being able to share with our brothers and sisters around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am in command of a boat that pushes large "rafts" of barges up and down a flowing river. These "rafts" are over 1,100 feet long & 105 feet wide and carry around 30,000 tons of cargo.

lender.name: Brooke
lender.loan_because: so I can help people make money to support their families. I want their kids to have a happy life.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school and learn lots of things from my teacher. I also get to play with my friends there. I hope some of my teachers and friends will join kiva and help other, too!

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I love people and want to see them succeed.

lender.name: Genni
lender.loan_because: a small loan can make a big difference.

lender.name: Jon & Jen
lender.loan_because: We want to make a small difference in the world.

lender.name: bobby
lender.loan_because: i have been work in this Bussisnes almost for 2 years, but because i dont have much money till now my studio just runing in my room, so i registered to kiva hopelly i have got a loan. So i can make my own studio in Jakarta. I prefer to open a tattoo studio because if i still work in my room is to risk about a sterillitation place, till now if i had finish my job i must clean all of my room with disinfectant, beside that if i have my own studio i can more work easilly and get more client.
lender.occupational_info: My work is a tattoo and piercing artist, where is about make a beautiful tattoo, and i want to make people understand today tattoo is not for a criminal, it;s just about art in our skin. Today to get tattoo is not easy like past time, we use a sterille needle, and ink which i must buy for international tattoo supply in us which one this is my job how to make a tattoo with a high quality procedure. If you want see a part of my portfolio you can click my friendster page.

lender.name: Nicole & Gerry
lender.loan_because: we want to enable people who are economically less forunate to realize their dreams and fulfill their entrepreneurial aspirations!
lender.occupational_info: Life coaches and business consultants.

lender.name: Rita
lender.loan_because: I want someone to have a chance to better their life and their childrens lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am first a Mom and grandmother. I take care of my grandson 2 days a week the other days I work in an office and sell protection to indivuals and small business from auto accidents, home fires, storm damage etc. Sort of boring work but I love the folks I work with and find ways to make it more interesting.

lender.name: Rob T
lender.loan_because: I believe helping people to succeed is more effective and motivates better than a simple gift. People will lift themselves out of poverty if we give them a hand.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: our vision is to develop our village shop in a sustainable way and that includes using some of our profits to support entrepreneurs on a global scale.
lender.occupational_info: selling food, vegetables and essentials to a small community in the countryside in the UK

lender.name: Karla
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life. It amazes me how so little can bring so much hope to others.

lender.name: Tara
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a helping hand in achieving their goals and dreams.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I hope it can help someone who is working hard to make their lives better to achieve that goal.
lender.occupational_info: I help families who may be at risk for an inherited condition to deal with the information and hopefully have healthier lives.

lender.name: Yvette
lender.loan_because: I can AND I like the idea of helping those who choose to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the IT systems and services for a private university in Miami, FL.

lender.name: carol
lender.loan_because: it's time for me to pay it forward outside of the USA
lender.occupational_info: I help people make plans to take care of themselves and families when they no longer work by investing their money for the future

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I want to be a global citizen.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a private school. I also make and sell accessories for people who love science fiction.

lender.name: dick & nance
lender.loan_because: I WANT TO GIVE TO THOSE LESS FORTUNATE THAN US. AS A BUSINESSMAN I AM INTERESTED IN INVESTING IN BUSINESS.
lender.occupational_info: HELP PEOPLE TO GET MONEY TO BUY HOMES AND GET MONEY TO USE FOR BUSINESS

lender.name: EARL Elevate Me!
lender.loan_because: it feels good.
lender.occupational_info: health food manufacturing and marketing

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: A friend encouraged me to experience Kiva. Understand the importance and impact of micro loans from Thomas Feeman in "The World is Flat".
lender.occupational_info: Understand the needs of the worlds consumer and try to solve a basic prolem to improve the daily life of this consumer.

lender.name: Jenn
lender.occupational_info: I look at babies before they are born with ultrasound.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I've seen first hand that loans can have a powerful effect on a lender's life.
lender.occupational_info: I've worked for investment banks, private equity firms, and was a Kiva Fellow in Cambodia.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to have had the chance to get a good education and earn enough money to provide for myself and my family. I want others to have opportunities as well.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the Kaiser Permanente health care system, the largest non-profit organization in the United States. My job is to use medical data to improve the efficiency and effectiveness of the health care that KP delivers.

lender.name: Nor & Sylvia
lender.loan_because: we believe the small amount of loans will help change and improve the lives of others.

lender.name: Elisabeth
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of sharing resources

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: I believe one person can make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I manage projects that build houses & infrastructure for communities

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: i love helping others that are working hard to improve their lives.

lender.name: Geniel
lender.loan_because: Without dreams there is no need to work. Without work there is no need to dream.
lender.occupational_info: My most important job is being a Mom to three children. I am also a nurse.

lender.name: Lori & Faical
lender.loan_because: We believe in empowering those who want to make a better life for themselves.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel GREAT to know I'm helping someone else.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.occupation: Mother of 2 great kids and 2 step kids.
lender.loan_because: I had been a single parent for many years and know the struggle of making ends meet and to give my children what they need. I think to give back so someone can make their life a bit easier is the least I can do.
lender.occupational_info: I try to be the best that I can be each and every day. To be able to help others is an amazing feeling. That makes me smile each and every day.

lender.name: Kari
lender.loan_because: I want to give women a chance to better their lives!!! I want them to have the same opportunities I had to borrow money and improve their economic situation in life.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English in a poor inner city all Hispanic high school in Phoenix

lender.name: Jan and Johanna

lender.name: Kiva B4B
lender.loan_because: Advanta was started in 1951 with $30 in seed money. Jack Alter, a Philadelphia school teacher, wanted to help fellow teachers get access to capital. Advanta learned early on that an entrepreneur with a little bit of money can change the world.
lender.occupational_info: The Kiva B4B Project is a collaboration between Kiva and Advanta Bank Corp. It encourages U.S. based businesses to support entrepreneurs in the developing world. For more information, visit www.kivab4b.org
